summary:
A principal reservoir engineer with 30+ years experience. 
Currently working on the Energy Transition, focusing on the realisation of the major CO2 storage projects that are foreseen in the Dutch offshore, with as aim to help The Netherlands to achieve its climate targets of the Paris agreement. Engaged in system optimisation of CO2 transport and injection, including integration of facilities, well-bore and subsurface aspects.
Strong experience with project management of subsurface oriented studies, including integrated reservoir studies, asset evaluations, reviews of field development plans and business plans.
Specialisation in the production optimisation and reservoir management of small gas fields in the offshore environment. Experience includes exploration well testing and prospect evaluation, field development planning, gas network modelling, reservoir modelling, asset evaluation, peer reviews, unitisation, field reserves determination and company reserves coordination.
High level of understanding of various disciplines in addition to reservoir engineering: production engineering, production operations, geology and petrophysics, drilling, commercial and business aspects. 
Ample supervisory experience, including project management, staff development, competency management, mentoring, and business planning.
